title: Twitter Execs Given The Boot | Daily Best of October 28 | Rick & Bubba
description:
Elon Musk fires multiple high-ranking employees at Twitter, but don't feel bad for them because they repeatedly silenced any voices that disagreed, plus they will receive huge payouts on their wayouts. Biden claims "the most common price of gas in America is $3.39, down from over $5 when [he] took office." Gas was actually $2.39 when he took office. Fetterman's campaign says it's "ableism" to point out his inability to communicate. And, we are so sorry, but nothing is going to happen to Hunter Biden and no one will be held accountable for burying that story.

That’s why Allegiance Gold has some of the highest ratings in the industry. 5-stars with Trust Link, Triple A rated with the Business Consumer Alliance and an A+ from the Better Business Bureau. Go to https://ProtectWithRickBubba.com and get their best offer yet, up to $2,500 of free silver, on a qualifying purchase, when you tell them RICK AND BUBBA sent you. Or give them a call 844-790-9191.
